scene_description_enriched: A priest, identified by his golden vestments and halo, holds a chalice aloft, performing a religious rite. He is positioned within a golden architectural structure featuring arches and decorative elements, possibly an altar or a tabernacle. Before him, several figures with halos, likely saints or holy individuals, are depicted in prayer, their hands clasped and faces turned upwards in devotion. The background is a deep blue adorned with golden stars, suggesting a celestial or divine setting. Red drapery frames the scene, adding a sense of solemnity and richness.
